dict.string:
# XXX: svk log doesn't support multiple paths # so if multiple files are selected, it will # only do the first one!
TM_SVK="${TM_SVK:=svk}" TM_RUBY="${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" FORMAT_LOG="${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/format_log.rb" TM_SVK_LOG_RANGE="${TM_SVK_LOG_RANGE:=BASE:1}"
if [[ -z $TM_SELECTED_FILES ]]; then "$TM_SVK" log -vr"$TM_SVK_LOG_RANGE" "$TM_FILEPATH" \ 2>&1| "$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_LOG" else eval "$TM_SVK" log -vr"$TM_SVK_LOG_RANGE" $TM_SELECTED_FILES \ 2>&1| "$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_LOG" fi
